Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.player.personalBoard

Interface Effector

All Known Implementing Classes:
PersonalBoard
public interface Effector
Effector interface is used to limit controller's access into the personal board.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addActiveLeader​(LeaderCard newLeader, boolean hasProduction)
    This method inserts the new leader into the activeLeaders list and, if it's a Production one, also in the activeProductionLeaders list.
    boolean
    addNewConversion​(PhysicalResource conversion)
    This method inserts a new white-marble conversion in the whiteMarbleConversions list.
    boolean
    setDiscount​(PhysicalResource discount)
    This method inserts a new discount (the Resource defines it) in the discountMap.
    boolean
    warehouseEvolution​(PhysicalResource extraShelf)
    This method evolves the warehouse onto a new ExtraShelf version.

  • Method Details

    • addActiveLeader

      boolean addActiveLeader​(LeaderCard newLeader, boolean hasProduction)
      This method inserts the new leader into the activeLeaders list and, if it's a Production one, also in the activeProductionLeaders list.
      Parameters:
      newLeader - is the new leader
      hasProduction - is a boolean identifying if it is a Production one or not
      Returns:
      true

    • warehouseEvolution

      boolean warehouseEvolution​(PhysicalResource extraShelf)
      This method evolves the warehouse onto a new ExtraShelf version. The new shelf define procedure is made by the ExtraShelfWarehouse constructor.
      Parameters:
      extraShelf - is the resource that has all the information about the new shelf (quantity and type)
      Returns:
      true

    • addNewConversion

      boolean addNewConversion​(PhysicalResource conversion)
      This method inserts a new white-marble conversion in the whiteMarbleConversions list.
      Parameters:
      conversion - is the new conversion to insert
      Returns:
      the operation on-finish flag

    • setDiscount

      boolean setDiscount​(PhysicalResource discount)
      This method inserts a new discount (the Resource defines it) in the discountMap.
      Parameters:
      discount - defines the new discount
      Returns:
      true
